APP.COPY: Life can get messy, but staying organized doesnâ€™t have to be hard. We help you manage it all with simple tools that keep you focused and in control. Stay effortlessly organized.

NEWHABIT.TYPE.INFO: Habits can either be done or not done.
BLOCKS.DIALOG.INFO: Use blocks to make a rough schedule about what you want to do. Blocks should be in timely order, like first block is before work, second is work, third and fourth are after work.
BLOCKS.4.INFO: Like meetings friends and family or events
